message:
SYSTEM: 03_SPARQL.pdf: Página 19
•  Graph patterns:  
•  BGPs 
•  P1 P2 
•  P FILTER R 
•  P1 UNION P2 
•  P1 OPTIONAL P2 
•  Semantics 
•  eval(D(G), graph pattern)  … 
 D is a dataset,  
  
 
 
 
 G is the “active graph” 
recursively defined for all graph patterns in Section 12.5 of  
 http://www.w3.org/TR/rdf-sparql-query/ 
Spec. semantics is a bit hard to read … 
Explained in more “accessible” terms in extended version of 
this Tutorial: http://www.polleres.net/presentations/
20101006SPARQL1.1Tutorial.pptx 
 
25 
Ontological Engineering Group
